title: How to Make Sweetened Green Iced Tea

steps.headline: This is done using the Iced Tea Maker by MC, a tea ball and tea bags.
Pour filtered water into the maker to line, approximately 3 quarts.
Add into 1 gallon (3.8 L) tea container:
steps.description: Brewed tea 2/3 cup turbinado raw sugar Ice and cold filtered water

steps.headline: You can use the tea ball tea twice and each tea bag twice if you want.

text: This is done using the Iced Tea Maker by MC, a tea ball and tea bags.  Pour filtered water into the maker to line, approximately 3 quarts.  Brew one cycle  Add into 1 gallon (3.8 L) tea container: Brewed tea 2/3 cup turbinado raw sugar Ice and cold filtered water You can use the tea ball tea twice and each tea bag twice if you want.  Finished.
